description: To support the increasing research interest in small RNA, CD Genomics is offering the qualified small RNA sequencing service that covers novel small RNA discovery, mutation characterization, and expression profiling of small RNAs by leveraging of advanced NGS technologies and data analysis pipeline. CD Genomics provides full small RNA sequencing service packages including sample standardization, library preparation, deep sequencing, raw data quality control, genome assembly, and customized bioinformatics analysis. We can tailor this pipeline to your research interest. If you have additional requirements or questions, please feel free to contact us.
name: Small RNA Sequencing
